attributes.action: We call for a Referendum on the United Kingdom's membership of the European Union
attributes.additional_details: The European Union is responsible for a huge array of legislation that effects the daily lives of the citizens of the UK.  It is also responsible for collecting and spending vast sums of our money.  Yet we, the public, have never had an opportunity to give our verdict on whether we believe that the EU, with it's parliaments, councils and public servants, is of benefit to us.  It is time for the pubic to decide and we call upon our Parliament to vote for a Referendum on the UK's membership of the EU.
